item.title: Here’s how Rivian changed the rear door manual release on the R2
item.dc:creator: Sean O'Kane
item.description: Rivian, along with other automakers, has been under pressure to make the manual door releases easier to access. The new R2 SUV does that — here's how.

item.title: Facebook adds new AI features, animated profile photos, and backgrounds for text posts
item.dc:creator: Lauren Forristal
item.description: Facebook's new AI features let users animate their profile pics, restyle their Stories and Memories, and add backgrounds to text posts.

item.title: Former Tesla product manager wants to make luxury goods impossible to fake, starting with a chip
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: The startup claims that it has developed a "hack-proof" chip that can't be bypassed by devices like Flipper Zero, a widely available hacking tool that can be used to tamper with wireless systems. These chips are linked with digital certificates to verify the authenticity of the products.

item.title: Singapore says China-backed hackers targeted its four largest phone companies
item.dc:creator: Zack Whittaker
item.description: The Singaporean government said the China-backed hackers gained "limited access to critical systems" run by the country's top four telecommunication giants, but said they did not disrupt services or steal customers' data.

item.title: Vega raises $120M Series B to rethink how enterprises detect cyber threats
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description: Vega Security raised $120 million, bringing its valuation to $700 million, in a round led by Accel. The company aims to rethink how enterprises detect cybersecurity threats.

item.title: What to know about Netflix’s landmark acquisition of Warner Bros.
item.dc:creator: Lauren Forristal
item.description: Learn more about Netflix's acquisition of Warner Bros., considered the most historic megadeal in Hollywood, as it continues to develop.

item.title: Google expands tools to let users remove sensitive data about themselves from Search
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description: Users will be able to more easily request the removal of results that include private information or non-consensual explicit imagery.

item.title: Trump EPA reportedly seeks to revoke landmark air pollution rule
item.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
item.description: EPA administrator Lee Zeldin is reportedly expected to repeal the 2009 "endangerment finding" that underpins U.S. climate regulatory efforts.

item.title: YouTubers aren’t relying on ad revenue anymore — here’s how some are diversifying
item.dc:creator: Lauren Forristal
item.description: YouTubers are no longer just creators, and in some cases, their side businesses are growing faster than their channels.

item.title: Hauler Hero collects $16M for its AI waste management software
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Szkutak
item.description: Hauler Hero has seen its customer base, revenue, and head count double since the company raised its seed round in 2024.

item.title: India orders social media platforms to take down deepfakes faster
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: India’s new rules take effect February 20, tightening deepfake oversight and shrinking takedown windows to as little as two hours.

item.title: Former GitHub CEO raises record $60M dev tool seed round at $300M valuation
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description: Thomas Dohmke's new startup offers an AI system to allow developers to better manage all the code AI agents produce.

item.title: Spotify hits a record 751M monthly users thanks to Wrapped, new free features
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: Spotify credited a successful Wrapped campaign and new features in its free tier for its rapid user growth.

item.title: Primary Ventures raises healthy $625M Fund V to focus on seed investing
item.dc:creator: Dominic-Madori Davis
item.description: Primary Ventures has closed a $625 million fund focused on seed investing nationwide. It's a sizable accomplishment for a seed-stage VC firm.

item.title: Proptech startup Smart Bricks raises $5M pre-seed led by a16z
item.dc:creator: Dominic-Madori Davis
item.description: Smart Bricks is an AI-powered proptech that helps investors find high-quality real estate investments.

item.title: AI video startup Runway raises $315M at $5.3B valuation, eyes more capable world models
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description: Startup Runway has raised a $315 million round at a $5.3 billion valuation, funds it will use to expand beyond AI video generation and into world models.

item.title: YouTube rolls out an AI playlist generator for Premium users
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: YouTube Music is rolling out a new AI-powered playlist-generation feature that allows Premium users on iOS and Android to use text prompts to create playlists.

item.title: The first signs of burnout are coming from the people who embrace AI the most
item.dc:creator: Connie Loizos
item.description: Because employees could do more, work began bleeding into lunch breaks and late evenings. The employees' to-do lists expanded to fill every hour that AI freed up, and then kept going.

item.title: Tem raises $75M to remake electricity markets using AI
item.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
item.description: Tem has built a transaction engine that relies on AI to cut costs. Lightspeed led the round to help the startup expand to the U.S. and Australia.

item.title: India makes Aadhaar more ubiquitous, but critics say security and privacy concerns remain
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: India's Aadhaar is moving into wallets and hotels and is policing through a new app. Critics say that amid the broader Aadhaar rollout, it's unclear how data shared through the new app would prevent breaches or leaks.
